p: For chiral analysis, we prepared dichloromethane extract of sample S4, commercial samples ( Eremanthus erythropappus ((-)-α-bisabolol), Salvia stenophylla ((-)-α-bisabolol and (+)-epi-α-bisabolol), Lippia dulcis ((+/-)-epi-α-bisabolol) and standards (+/-)-α-bisabolol. The racemic bisabolol (Dragostanol) standard was kindly provided by Dr. Matthias Panten from Symrise.
